{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1786577,"totalDownVotes":111976,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🔥 🔵 UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":112847,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 🔵 UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2939051,"totalDownVotes":448053,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":306185,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.

Thanks for playing!

Private Server Controls: To open private server controls you must be owner of a server and click the grey button on top left of screen.

","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":493798,"totalDownVotes":30228,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X 📈TRADE UPDATE] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":28771,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":250,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x legendary fruit rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:

Ctrl-Climb

WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":860709,"totalDownVotes":60007,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPD 26] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":33463,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

- Increased limit breaker and Daily Gift timers
- Bug fixes + balance changes + improvements","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5613123,"totalDownVotes":1090086,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":114178,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌨️ It's Snowing! 🌨️

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/1226491/RW","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":5137747,"totalDownVotes":446118,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":40698,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 
Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":13632331,"creatorName":"A_TEAM_","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":771845,"totalDownVotes":32871,"universeId":3405618667,"name":"[UPD] Sonic Speed Simulator","placeId":9049840490,"playerCount":45314,"imageToken":"T_9049840490_a6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨THE OFFICIAL SONIC THE HEDGEHOG GAME ON ROBLOX!

🔔 Updates every week! FOLLOW & FAVORITE to be notified!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":730795,"totalDownVotes":323628,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":23649,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2689533,"totalDownVotes":346440,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":34248,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1028848,"totalDownVotes":84064,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":23719,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Collect them all!

❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🔨More updates upcoming!","genre":""},{"creatorId":14179659,"creatorName":"FLOPPA#1","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":266838,"totalDownVotes":24512,"universeId":3451663900,"name":"raise a floppa 🔊","placeId":9203864304,"playerCount":30356,"imageToken":"T_9203864304_5c93","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"multiplayer now has voice chat","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3915101,"totalDownVotes":484711,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":18523,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Lock and Load with the exclusive Virtual Nomad Bundle through Prime Gaming and unlock six unique functionalities: Character Skin, Custom Emote, Weapon Skin, Elimination Effect, Melee Weapon, and Calling Card

1) Log in to your account on roblox.com
2) Go to roblox.com/redeem and enter your code.
3) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor. Enjoy!

After you redeem the offer on roblox.com/redeem, launch Arsenal on Roblox, open the Prime Gaming pop-up, and select “Redeem Item” to receive the bonus rewards. Then, go into your Locker to equip th

Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":899518,"totalDownVotes":101245,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":14548,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.9』 🏹✨
➢ New trading system; Trade Stands! Trade Items! and multiple other QoL features
➢ 7 new Stand skins!
➢ 4 new Cosmetics!
➢ and more in game!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":12420072,"creatorName":"Lightning Dragon Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":228086,"totalDownVotes":13780,"universeId":3262314006,"name":"[EVENT+2x⚔️🥚] Weapon Fighting Simulator","placeId":8554378337,"playerCount":22204,"imageToken":"T_8554378337_148f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🥋 Welcome to Weapon Fighting Simulator 🥋
WFS is a simulator game where you fight against enemies with weapons, spells and become the strongest martial fighter of all times!

🗡️ - Unlock new and powerful weapons!
🧙‍♂️ - Unlock new spells to aid you in battle!
🗺️ - Discover new worlds with different enemies and BOSS!

🎡 Roblox Premium members get x2 Wheel Rewards

🔥 UPDATE [15]:
- New World 13 - Crystal Forest
- Added 8 new weapons
- Added 4 spells
- New rank expansion (Expert Qi III)
- New Mother's day event
- Starting from World 12, each map will add an eternal weapon with higher damage
- Added new Defense Mode achievements
+ MORE, CHECK OUT NOW!

🌐 - Join the Lightning Dragon Studios group for a free "Fan" Nametag above your name!
👍 -  Thumbs up and favorite for more updates!

🚀 RELEASE CODES: weaponfighting, welcome, goodluck, happyday
🎁 NEW UPDATE CODE: map13
👍 225K LIKES CODE(Pay attention to case): likes_225K
💖 NEW CODE AT 250K LIKES.","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1611231,"totalDownVotes":88688,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":14306,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🧸 Bee Swarm Simulator toys are available now at Walmart Supercenters and Smyths Toys! Collect toy bees and hive slots to construct a real hive! There are also adorable plushies, bear action figures, and more! 🎉

Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2172168,"totalDownVotes":163577,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":22759,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

══ UPDATE 54 ══
🛰️ Skytopia, the future of Topia City, is now open to the public! This is a brand new futuristic experience, and we welcome everyone to explore! Come and have an incredible journey with your friends!
🔔 Today's update is fully dedicated to Skytopia and we will resume regular Livetopia updates next Friday.

══ IT'S YOUR W🌎RLD ══

Please thumbs-up 👍 and favorite ⭐ if you enjoy the game.
👍 800k likes to unlock Twin Stroller!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5173746,"creatorName":"Dream Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":28970,"totalDownVotes":2694,"universeId":3475191052,"name":"[+2🍀] ⚽Goal Kick Simulator","placeId":9281034297,"playerCount":30041,"imageToken":"T_9281034297_ed60","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[EVENT] Limited +2🍀- Get better balls from chests!

Tags: Soccer, Kicking, Sim, Fun","genre":""},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Venture Lagoons","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":734021,"totalDownVotes":68280,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update 3.5 🌋🧊] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":19344,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3400
There are 36 Physical Fruits In-Game
